list.description:
Pack of 5 sights for LAV-AD

11-24-2023 : UPDATE => Rework of sights, added adapted realistic sights.

Contain the folder with this sights:

-Realistic sight
-Realistic sight adapted for Hydra 70 (use with gunner's optic sniper view)
-Realistic sight adapted for Hydra 70 (use with standard sniper view)
-Diagonal sight for Hydra 70 and telemetry for 25mm gun (use with gunner's optic sniper view)
-Sight for Hydra 70 and telemetry for 25mm gun (use with standard sniper view)

The central square, informations and the jauge on the right side are dynamic in th...

This is M1 Abrams FCS sight style custom sight package with illuminate custom color crosshair.
Contained : Magach 7C, WZ1001, Khalid, M1128 Wolfpack, AMX-32105

#sight

#2s6

Zoom : 8.0x

All vehicles using anti tank missiles can be used

基于缩放倍率为4.0x-12.0x的炮镜进行创作，是个导弹通用瞄具。

#wiesel2

Germ - wiesel2 Sight
Zoom : 2.0x - 6.0x

Usage method : Put the. blk file in the folder of the vehicle，Restart the game，Select a custom sight in Game Options - General Combat Settings
Example : E:\SteamLibrary\steamapps\common\War Thunder\UserSights\germ_wiesel_2_adwc

使用说明 : 把.blk文件放到对应载具的文件夹内，重启游戏或重新加载自定义瞄具，在游戏选项-通用战斗设置中选择自定义瞄具。
例 : E:\SteamLibrary\steamapps\common\War Thunder\UserSights\germ_wiesel_2_adwc

#m1a1_hc_abrams #m1a2_abrams #m1a2sep_abrams

Due to the change of the game version, the text of the aiming interface has been seriously misaligned and has been fixed

由于游戏版本的变更，之前的瞄准界面文本严重错位，已经修复

Got bored and decided to make my first user sight. I present to you, sharkie!
he's there for emotional support :p

Installation: WarThunder\UserSights\all_tanks

#sharky #shark #femboy #all_tanks
#furryfriend

A modern universal sight has been made, and all vehicles can be used. I hope you like it and point it out. It is applicable to multiple vehicles and all vehicles. Please copy the file "all_tanks" to the "UserSights" file. If not, please create it.. Back to the game, press Alt+F9 to update the game data and select the uploaded marker.
做了一个现代通用瞄具，所有载具都可以用，希望大家喜欢和指正。适用于所有辆车，请将文件“all_tanks”复制到“UserSights”文件下，没有请创建，返回游戏，按 Alt + F9 更新游戏数据并选择上传的标线。

bocchi

list.description: All scaling ratios can be used

#puma

PUMA Sight
Zoom : 2.0x - 14.7x

Usage method : Put the. blk file in the folder of the vehicle，Restart the game，Select a custom sight in Game Options - General Combat Settings
Example : E:\SteamLibrary\steamapps\common\War Thunder\UserSights\germ_schutzenpanzer_puma

使用说明 : 把.blk文件放到对应载具的文件夹内，重启游戏或重新加载自定义瞄具，在游戏选项-通用战斗设置中选择自定义瞄具。
例 : E:\SteamLibrary\steamapps\common\War Thunder\UserSights\germ_schutzenpanzer_puma

Semi-historical universal gunsights of all countries
全系拟真通用瞄具

Great update in 2022.1122

This is a collection of all countries AFVs universal gunsights.They are simple, functional & semi-historical.
这是全系战车通用瞄具的集合。它们贴近历史，又简单实用。
Enjoy them !
享用它们吧！

all in
https://live.warthunder.com/post/993921/en/
​

Minimalistic tank sight

Minimalistic tank sight inspired by WOJTEK885's sight found here: https://live.warthunder.com/post/1052013/en/

Should work on all tanks (although I have not tested). Just put the "all_tanks" folder from the zip file inside the UserSights folder or if you already have an "all_tanks" folder, extract the minimal_sight.blk to the existing folder.

The pictures show the sight on the bmp-2m.

Edit:
Added new version. +1

Enjoy!

#all_tanks #simple #minimal #sight #ifv #mbt
